name: web_search
content:
**Apple Stock News, Momentum, & Analyst Sentiment (June 2024)**

- **Latest News:**  
  - Apple (AAPL) shares have hit all-time highs after unveiling new AI features dubbed "Apple Intelligence" at WWDC 2024, integrating ChatGPT-like tools into iOS 18 and boosting enthusiasm about AI-driven growth potential.[^1]
  - There‚Äôs a positive response from investors, with Apple surpassing Microsoft as the world‚Äôs most valuable company again as of mid-June 2024.[^2]

- **Momentum:**  
  - The stock is up over 15% in the past month and has significantly outperformed the S&P 500 recently.
  - Technical indicators show strong upward momentum; trading volume increased following product announcements, pushing AAPL further into ‚Äúoverbought‚Äù territory on some charts.[^3]

- **Analyst Sentiment:**  
  - Most Wall Street analysts rate Apple as a ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù or ‚ÄúOverweight.‚Äù
  - Several firms (including Morgan Stanley and Wedbush) have raised their price targets slightly above $220 on optimism about Apple‚Äôs AI announcement and potential for new hardware cycles later in 2024.[^4]

---

**Sources:**  
[^1]: [CNBC - Apple stock hits record high amid AI enthusiasm (June 11, 2024)](https://www.cnbc.com/2024/06/11/apple-hits-record-high-as-ai-enthusiasm-grows.html)  
[^2]: [Reuters - Apple regains crown as world‚Äôs most valuable company (June 13, 2024)](https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-regains-crown-as-worlds-most-valuable-company-2024-06-13/)  
[^3]: [Yahoo Finance - Apple technical analysis & stock charting (June 2024)](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/AAPL/chart/)  
[^4]: [MarketWatch - Analysts raise price targets after WWDC AI reveal (June 2024)](https://www.marketwatch.com/investing/stock/aapl/analystestimates)
